page.title: 11RECREATION IN HOUNSLOW (1)
page.content: A survey was taken involving 50 people about their pastimes. Some people were found to take part in active pastimes but others simply did things to fill their time. The survey consisted of questions asking what was their favourite pastime, where they did it and how often they did it. For example only one person did ballet, two did dancing, and one did singing. Fishing was four peoples pastime and tennis and squash had five and three people respectively. The less popular pastimes turned out to be knitting,karate,watching videos, Bingo, keep fit, Joggng, wine making, Theatre_going, concert_going, motor_maintainence, computer studies and socialising which all had only one participant.
